section_overview: Everything you may need during show weeks: groceries, pharmacies, feed and tack, and even rentals. These stops keep barn life running smoothly during long circuits.
section_spotlight: Know your essentials before the week starts — nothing stalls a schedule like a last-minute run.
section_cta_text: Map your essentials in advance — grocery, pharmacy, feed, tack, golf carts, and car rentals.

bucket_definitions.grocery: Markets for barn meal prep and rider snacks.
bucket_definitions.pharmacy: 24-hour or late-close for meds and supplies.
bucket_definitions.car_rental: Standard car rentals for barns and families.
bucket_definitions.golfcart_rental: On-site or near-site golf cart rentals.

car_rental.name: Palm Beach Car Rentals
car_rental.notes: SUVs and vans for barn crews.

golfcart_rental.name: WEF Cart Co.
golfcart_rental.notes: On-site vendor, service during show season.
